BR_text.BRsummary: Error during QA dataprocessing when context is empty
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 The problem is twofold:
 
 If we have no text inside the document we get a Runtime error.
 If we have text that does not contain the answer we do not have any warning messages.
 
 Error message
 <denchmark-code>  File "/foo/FARM/farm/data_handler/data_silo.py", line 176, in _get_dataset
     for dataset, tensor_names in results:
   File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/pool.py", line 735, in next
     raise value
 TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
 </denchmark-code>
 
 
 I uploaded a <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/Timoeller/84da8f7bd41754a768f8c49896b365b8>sample file</denchmark-link>
  to reproduce the error.
 For problem 1. mentioned above take the file as is.
 For problem 2. just insert any characters into the first context
